DOC.brief_summary: It is a pilot study to evaluate the feasibility and the efficiency of local delivery of paclitaxel after stenting of long femoropopliteal arterial lesions TASC C and D before the realization of a large randomized multicentric study. Patients concerned are in critical ischemia.
DOC.brief_title: STREAMER : STent Restenosis And MEdicaments Release
DOC.criteria: patients with critical ischemia of a lower limb with ankle pressure < 50 mmHg lesions TASC C and D of the superficial femoral or popliteal artery patient allergic to paclitaxel patient with a cancer, a neutropenia, with immunosuppressor medicament or chemotherapy patient with contraindication to take 2 antiaggregants platelets
DOC.keyword: femoropopliteal artery lesions TASC C and D
